rules_text:
Elusive [i](This spell can't be targeted or copied. If this spell has target(s)[/i], those cannot be changed by spells or abilities.)
First strike, ward {3}
Whenever a non-Human creature you control deals combat damage to a player, put a land card from your graveyard onto the battlefield tapped.
Sacrifice a non-Human creature: Each player mills cards equal to the sacrificed creatures power.
